location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: 'MAP SHOWING SELECTION BY THE BAHREIN PETROLEUM COMPANY LIMITED UNDER CONCESSION DATED DECEMBER 2ND 1925'

physicalDescription.extent: Materials: Printed on paperDimensions: 480mm x 1280mm, on sheet 510mm x 1340mm

mods.abstract: The map shows the extent of the concession of the Bahrein Petroleum Company, 2 December 1925 and gives a description of the boundaries of the concession. A note explains that this is the second schedule to the lease dated December 1934, and made between the Shaikh of Bahrain and the Bahrein Petroleum Company.An inset map shows the concession as it was situated within Muharraq Island.
